Clear text
I hate Facebook. I don\'t care what stupid minutiae is going on in my friends\' and relatives\' lives.
Ask not what your country can do for you but what you can do for your country.
Trying is the first step towards failure.
Why don\'t we do it in the road?
I should go to sleep. I have class later.
I can haz Cheeseburger.
When I grow up, I want to be famous!
Do you know when I will die? I hope not soon.
To be or not to be, that is the question.
What you gonna do with all that junk, all that junk inside your trunk.
Lady gaga has beatifully shaped eyebrows.
My father is a real estate agent.
I am an original person and no one can ever be like me!
I don\'t appreciate you making fun of me.
You\'re doing it wrong.
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down, never gonna run around and desert you.
If your life stinks, you might need a shower.
I enjoy pancakes.
What is the meaning of life?
The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don\'t want, drink what you don\'t like, and do what you\'d rather not.
Everyone is entitled to their own opinion. It\'s just that yours is stupid.
He who laughs last didn\'t get it.
Never take life seriously. Nobody gets out alive anyway.
Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance?
The road to success is always under construction.
Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
There are no stupid questions, just stupid people.
Everyone has photographic memory; some just don\'t have the film.
You tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is \'never try\'.
Energizer Bunny arrested, charged with battery.
The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
Car service: If it ain\'t broke, we\'ll break it.
In God we trust; all others must pay cash.
All generalizations are false, including this one.
Ah, beer, my one weakness. My achilles heel, if you will.
Anything worth doing is worth doing slowly.
Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
I am free of all prejudices. I hate every one equally.
I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.
I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
My theory is that all of Scottish cuisine is based on a dare.
There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
The difference between genius and stupidity is that genius has its limits.
I can tell you\'re lying. Your lips are moving.
